faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.designProcessQ: What is your architectural design process?
faq.designProcessA: Our design process involves initial consultation, concept development, detailed planning, and final documentation with regular client feedback throughout.
faq.timelineQ: How long does a typical architectural project take?
faq.timelineA: Project timelines vary based on scope, but typically range from 2-6 months for design and documentation, excluding construction time.
faq.woodTypeQ: What types of wood do you work with?
faq.woodTypeA: We work with a wide range of woods including oak, maple, pine, walnut, and exotic hardwoods, choosing the best material for your specific project.
faq.maintenanceQ: How should I maintain my wooden furniture?
faq.maintenanceA: Regular dusting, avoiding direct sunlight, and periodic polishing with appropriate wood care products will help maintain your furniture's beauty.
faq.rustPreventionQ: How can I prevent rust on my ironwork?
faq.rustPreventionA: Regular cleaning, proper coating maintenance, and protecting from excessive moisture are key to preventing rust on ironwork.
faq.servicesQ: What types of ironwork services do you offer?
faq.servicesA: We offer custom fabrication, repairs, restoration, and installation services for both decorative and structural ironwork.
